Directed by Samuel Donovan. Tracey Deer. Daniel Grou.

Written by Emilia di Girolamo. Emilia di Girolamo. Louise Penny. Louise Penny. Jamie Crichton. Catherine Tregenna.

Rosemary Dunsmore( Irene Morrow). MylÃ¨ne Dinh-Robic( Sandra Morrow). Stuart Hughes( Charles Morrow). Willow Astbury( Young Mariana Morrow). Jack Molloy Legault( Young Thomas Morrow). Manny Benda( Young Maurice). Vincent Leclerc( Maurice Tradeau). Acacia Hanvelt( Bean). Simone-Ã‰lise Girard( CC de Poitiers). Jessica Lee( Drunk Kid #1). Madelyn Keys( Drunk Kid #2). Liam Condo( Drunk Kid #3). Iannicko N’Doua-LÃ©garÃ©( Saul Petrov). Emmet Graham( Drunk Kid #4). Roberta Battaglia( Crie). Robert Moloney( Richard Lyon). Jill Frappier( Emilie LongprÃ©). Kathleen Fee( Kaye Thompson). Simone Dumoulin( Sophie’s Piano Double). Bobby Daniels( Mr. Maynard). Tehahsitaieronni Deer( Matthew) . Dreyden David( Mohawk Boy #1). Rawennawanen Keese Olivier Swamp( Mohawk Boy #2). Michael Hearn( Arthur Ellis). Ginette Beaumont( Elderly Homeless Woman – Eleanor). Jean Bernard( SQ Officer). Jonel Beauvais( Indigenous Woman at Protest). Violet Sutherland( Young Bea). Arthur Holden( The Caretaker). Nicolas Paquin( Gamache’s Father). Lucy Van Oldenbarneveld( Reporter). Elysia Bryan-Barnes( Reporter). Juliette Louie( SQ Officer Search Team #1). Elisabeth Etienne( SQ Officer #1). Iehwatsirahni:Ra’ts Gilbert( Mathilde Lacost). Shareena Jebb( Lili Lacoste). Sabrina Auclair( SQ Officer #2). Thierry Yatma-Beye( Piano Student). Robert Montcalm( Chowski). Leisa Reid( Female SIJ Agent). Katsitsionni Fox( Mohawk Singer #1). Konwaherawi Cross( Young Indigenous Girl). Katherine Turnbull( SQ Officer at Cell). Theresa Fox( Mohawk Singer #2). Yue Qi( Dante). Michael Douglas Cake( Smoking Janitor). Bryan Morneau( SQ Officer). Status Finished (2022–2022)
